participant_2.background:
I'm a twentysomething female who enjoys horror movies and rock music.
I am a loner and my family are my only friends.
I'm going to try a new recipe for a healthy snack for my kids.
i paddle board on my days off.
I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family.

content.text: I am doing well! I just spent the morning paddle boarding and now I am trying a new recipe for a healthy snack for my kids.
That sounds really fun! I love paddle boarding. Is there a certain type of snack you are making?
I am making a trail mix with dried fruit, nuts, and seeds. My kids love it! I used to be a teacher, but I wanted to spend more time with my family.
That is awesome! I am a stay at home mom too. I love that we get to be there for our kids.
I agree! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to learn about my father's culture and heritage. I also love to read, write, and go to the movies.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love horror movies and rock music. I am also a loner and my family are my only friends.
I love horror movies too! I have always been a little bit of a loner, but I have made some great friends since I had kids.
That is great! I am happy that you have made some good friends.
Thank you! I am glad that I met you too!
Me too! We should hang out sometime!
